edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.gui.prefs

Class PreferencesPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.gui.prefs.PreferencesPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class PreferencesPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

    The panel in which preferences are displayed. There is a single panel that is used whenever a preference dialog is displayed, which can be done with SHOW_PREFS_DIALOG.

    The panel consists of three main components:

    • The main component is the PreferenceGroupPanel of the selected PreferenceGroup. This displays the preferences in the current preference group.
    • To the left is a JTree showing the preference-group hierarchy, which allows users to select a group.
    • At the bottom are the following buttons, all of which act on all preferences, not just those shown:
      • Apply: propogates the values the user set on the components to their associated Preference objects and then to the backing store.
      • Save: the same as Apply, but closes the dialog afterwards.
      • Cancel: closes the dialog without applying the values the user set, which are lost.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • SHOW_PREFS_DIALOG

        public static final javax.swing.Action SHOW_PREFS_DIALOG
        Displays the preferences panel in a dialog with the given owner. Also resets the preferences' components to the main values, and sets the initial preference group to the first child of the root.
